Skills checklist task (10 points each) item completed correctly? YSI calibration followed SOP to calibrate DO, conductivity, and pH (2-point calibration) waited for readings to stabilize before accepting calibration Program and deploy continuous data logger Followed SOP to program continuous HOBO datalogger to deploy at desired date, time and sampling interval using HOBO Connect phone app Securely attached logger to block for underwater deployment Securely attached line to block and buoy to line using proper knots (bowline and lobster buoy hitch) Filtering for TSS Followed SOP to filter water samples for TSS Wore gloves Used pre-muffled filters for TSS Recorded volume filtered Rinsed filter with DI water before removing filter from filter funnel Folded filter in half with filtrate facing in before placing in foil Labeled foil with name, date, location, filter number, and volume filtered Basic water quality measurements Followed SOP to use YSI, secchi disk, and LiCOR to measure water quality, secchi depth, and a vertical light profile Waited for YSI readings to stabilize before recording data Accurately transcribed YSI, secchi disk, and light data to water quality data sheet Recorded researcher names, date, and location on water quality data sheet Properly secure boat Properly secured boat to dock using a cleat hitch and clove hitch+half hitch
